content.question: Material <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> is placed in thermal contact with Material <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math>. Initially, Material <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> has a greater temperature than Material <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math>. Which of the following statements best predicts the energy transfer as a result of collisions between atoms of Material <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> and atoms of Material <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math>?

choices.label: It is more likely that energy will transfer from Material <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> atoms to Material <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math> atoms.

It is more likely that energy will transfer from Material <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math> atoms to Material <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> atoms.

It is equally likely that energy will transfer from Material <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> atoms to Material <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math> atoms.

No energy will transfer between Material <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> atoms and Material <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math> atoms.

content.answer: It is more likely that energy will transfer from Material <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> atoms to Material <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math> atoms.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
